items.summary: Update the minimum deposit amount validation in the backend from its current value to 10 rupees (₹10). Reject any deposit requests below this threshold with an appropriate error message.

Update the minimum deposit amount displayed and enforced in the ManualDepositModal frontend component to ₹10. The input field should show a minimum value of 10, and client-side validation should prevent submission of amounts below ₹10 with an error message stating the minimum is ₹10.
